Desc.entry: A registered charity that offers advice in the following areas: benefits, employment, housing, consumer, tax, debt, child support, relationship breakdown, etc. Home visits within catchment area if client unable to get into centre. Helps with reviews and represents at Social Security and Disability Appeal Tribunals. Will also help with County Court cases, including housing repossessions and evictions. Self or any referral.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8.30am-4.30pm (office times); Mon, Wed & Fri 10am-1pm, Thurs 11.30am-2.30pm (drop-in advice sessions)
